message: The first thing I notice when I step outside is that everyone on the street looks happy.
Maybe this is just what rich cities are like.
But it's almost too perfect, like a shot from a movie or something.
I figure I must stick out like a sore thumb, but no one around me seems to notice.
Might as well try and find a parts shop.
Going by the map on my invitation, there should be a mall nearby.
I walk past a bunch of different shops before finally stopping at one. Neatly groomed dog Allmates are sitting in the window.
This place might have the parts I'm looking for.
